title: Smartphone-Based CAI Language Instruction Design for Students with Learning and Behavioral Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A project-based class analyzing the impact of animation utilization on learning effectiveness and concentration in a smartphone-centric environment.

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform language tasks (vocabulary/grammar) for 20 minutes at least three times per week via a CAI program.
Learners can evaluate differences in learning satisfaction based on animation feedback types using a 5-point scale.
Learners achieve an average task completion rate of over 80% when using CAI for four weeks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
